text: Tracheal and cloacal swabs were eluted into 0 . 5 mL and 1 mL , respectively of PBS containing antibiotics . Viral RNA was extracted from 100 mL of either clarified - andultracentrifuged blood , tissue homogenates or pelleted blood cells , using the commercial NucleoSpinRNA kit ( Macherey - Nagel , Duren , Germany ) for manual extraction and from 50 µL of PBS containing a swab suspension , using the Ambion MagMax - 96 AI - ND Viral RNA Isolation kit for the automatic extractor .
